about.title: About ProximaShare
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make file sharing simple, secure, and accessible to everyone around the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: ProximaShare was born from the belief that sharing files should be effortless, secure, and respect your privacy. In a world where data breaches and privacy concerns are increasingly common, we've built a platform that puts security and user control at the forefront.
mission.description2: Our team of security experts and developers work tirelessly to ensure that every file you share is protected with bank-level encryption, while maintaining the simplicity and speed you expect from modern file sharing.
mission.description3: Whether you're a business professional sharing sensitive documents, a creative sharing your latest work, or simply someone who wants to send files to friends and family, ProximaShare provides the tools you need with the security you deserve.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Your files are protected with AES-256 encryption, the same standard used by banks and government agencies. Every upload is secured from the moment it leaves your device.

speed.title: Lightning Performance
speed.description: Our global CDN and optimized infrastructure ensure your files upload and download at maximum speed, regardless of your location.

global.title: Worldwide Access
global.description: Access your shared files from anywhere in the world with our globally distributed servers and multi-language support.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Files are encrypted on your device before upload and remain encrypted until download.

download.title: Smart Download Limits
download.description: Control how many times your files can be downloaded for enhanced security.

sharing.title: Flexible Sharing
sharing.description: Share via direct links, email, or generate QR codes for easy mobile access.

expiration.title: Auto Expiration
expiration.description: Links automatically expire after a set time or number of downloads.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Share files with teams and track who has accessed your content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect and handle your data with complete transparency.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.description: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your personal information.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: We clearly explain what data we collect, how we use it, and who we share it with.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Your files are encrypted and stored securely with multiple layers of protection.

deletion.title: Automatic Deletion
deletion.description: Files are automatically deleted after expiration with no recovery possible.

minimal.title: Minimal Data Collection
minimal.description: We only collect the minimum data necessary to provide our service.

compliance.title: Global Compliance
compliance.description: We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other international privacy regulations.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect only the minimum information necessary to provide our file sharing service:
dataCollection.item1: File metadata (name, size, type) for upload processing
dataCollection.item2: IP address for security and abuse prevention
dataCollection.item3: Browser information for compatibility and optimization

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: Your data is used solely to provide and improve our file sharing service. We never sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Files are automatically deleted after 5 minutes or 3 downloads, whichever comes first. Metadata is retained for 30 days for security purposes, then permanently deleted.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: Under GDPR and other privacy laws, you have the following rights:
userRights.right1: Right to access your personal data
userRights.right3: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please don't hesitate to contact us.

cookies.title: We value your privacy
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze our traffic. You can customize your preferences below.
